Description:
WOW Real Estate Development is currently looking for Sales and Leasing Coordinator /Guest Relation(F E M A L E Multilingual - R u s s i a n speaker preferred)Responsibilities:Able to prepare all rental and sales documents (Booking forms, sales offers, etc.)
Managing after-sales admin work
Monitor, check, follow up and compile & monitor purchasers’ requests, Sales and Purchase Agreement and payment timeline
Maintains Sales gallery visitors report and sales report
Developing and maintaining filing systems so as to maintain sales recordsRequirements:Atleast 3 years’ experience in real estate sales team- property developer experience preferred (within UAE)
Computer literacy
Good administrative, organizational, and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication, sales, and customer service skills
The ability to multitask, work in a fast-paced environment
Professional and polished appearance
Adaptable and flexible with a positive attitudeBenefits:Monthly salary package
Medical Insurance
Residence Visa
Annual Leave and Air ticketSkills
